0xE0FF064D.name: SET_ENTITY_HEADING

params.name: entity
params.description: The entity to set the heading for.

0xE0FF064D.description:
Set the heading of an entity in degrees also known as "Yaw".

**This is the server-side RPC native equivalent of the client native [SET_ENTITY_HEADING](?\_0x8E2530AA8ADA980E).**
